analysis.description:
airDrop.transfer (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol#428-440) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_addresses[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol#436-439)

airDrop.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol#440-448) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(_from,_addresses[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol)

airDrop.withdraw (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,_value) (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol)

airDrop.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(_token).transfer(owner,_value) (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol)

airDrop.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_addresses[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol#436-439)

airDrop.transferFrom has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transferFrom(_from,_addresses[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/29/0x18f3db770cfd17edb07f0d0c8a2494c5329498bf.sol)
